content:
The 31-year-old headquarters of the united city shopping center and JV made a requirement to buy an entrance door for almost 24 thousand hryvnias.

About thisShe reported March 20Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region.

According to the investigation, the official promised, behind the installed door, to ensure the cancellation of the summons and not to enter information about his search into the information subsystems.

The suspect was detained while receiving a check confirming payment for services.

Currently, he has been remanded in custody with the right to post bail.

AsThe Armyinform reported, on the border for the attempt of a bribe was detained.
title: In the Ternopil region, the TCC employee demanded a door for cancellation of the summons
description: This was reported on March 20 by the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region. According to investigation, ...
author: Army Inform
